name: The Flight
description:
The Flight
Ronnie's skydiving adventure

Follow the story of Ronnie as he skydives for the first time!

Featuring:
- 113 lines of story!
- Music that keeps you at the edge of your seat!
- Stunning visuals!
- Thrilling gameplay mechanics!
- Available on Windows, MacOS and Linux!
- Powered by cutting-edge Ren'py engine!

You'll love this. And it's free. Treat yourself to an Experience.

Made for the Watch + Jam 3 Game Jam, with the theme "THE EDGE OF THE MAPPED AREA, and its best friend, THE SUB-OCEAN!".
